app.title: Web Scraper
app.description: Scrape websites, extract data, analyze content and export to Excel/PDF. Choose a tab below to get started.

tooltips.scrape: Scrape a single webpage. Extracts links, images, text and more.
tooltips.crawl: Crawl an entire website. Automatically follows links and scrapes multiple pages.
tooltips.custom: Use CSS selectors to extract specific elements. For advanced users.
tooltips.bulk: Scrape multiple URLs at once. Useful for comparing different sites.
tooltips.history: View and manage your previous scrapes. Export or delete items.
tooltips.changes: Compare two scrapes and see what has changed on a website.
tooltips.seo: Analyze SEO aspects of a scraped page. Requires a scrape first.
tooltips.visualization: Visualize scraped data with charts and diagrams. Requires a scrape first.
tooltips.analytics: View statistics about all your scrapes. Success rates, most scraped sites, etc.
tooltips.proxy: Manage proxies for rotation and anti-bot bypass. Add proxies and monitor health.
tooltips.insights: AI-powered content insights: summaries, categorization, topics and sentiment analysis.
tooltips.settings: Manage language settings and other preferences.
